query.name: TSSRegions_FlankingRegion_Gene
query.longDescription: For a specified TSS region or list of TSS regions, show the genes that have been mapped in the flanking region of the specified TSS region(s).

template.name: TSSRegions_FlankingRegion_BindingSites
template.title: TSS region(s) + ChIP target(s) --> Binding sites

query.name: TSSRegions_FlankingRegion_BindingSites
query.longDescription: For a specified TSS region or list of TSS regions, show the binding sites that have been mapped in the specified TSS region(s) and ChIP target(s).

query.name: ChIP_Target_Submissions
query.longDescription: For a specified ChIP target or list of ChIP targets, show the submissions that have used the specified ChIP target(s).

query.name: ChIP_Target_BindingSites
query.view: BindingSite.score BindingSite.primaryIdentifier BindingSite.chromosome.primaryIdentifier BindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end BindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start BindingSite.submissions.name BindingSite.submissions.antibodies.targetName
query.longDescription: For a specified ChIP target or list of ChIP targets, show the binding sites.

template.name: ChIP_Target_Gene_Flanking_BindingSites
template.title: ChIP target(s) + Gene(s) --> Binding sites in Gene flanking region

query.name: ChIP_Target_Gene_Flanking_BindingSites
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E
query.longDescription: For a specified ChIP target or list of ChIP targets, show the binding sites that have been mapped in the flanking region of the specified gene(s).

query.name: ChIP_Target_TSSRegions
query.longDescription: For a specified ChIP target or list of ChIP targets, show the TSS regions that have been mapped in the ChIP target's binding sites.

constraint.description: Show TSSRegions only for this ChIP target:

query.name: Gene_Adjacent_Genes
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the adjacent genes (upstream and downstream).

query.name: Gene_BindingSites
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the overlapping binding sites.

constraint.description: Show binding sites which overlap the following gene or list of genes:

query.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_BindingSites
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the binding sites that have been mapped in the flanking region of the specified gene(s).

template.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_BindingSites_Genes
template.title: Gene flanking region --> Binding Sites and adjacent Genes

query.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_BindingSites_Genes
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and E and A
query.longDescription: Show the binding sites identified and any adjacent genes at a specified distance.

constraint.value: Identifying genome-wide binding sites for GCN5b

template.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_OverlappingFeatures
template.title: Gene(s) + Flanking region --> Specific overlapping features

query.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_OverlappingFeatures
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the selected sequence features that have been mapped in the flanking region of the specified gene or list of genes.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Gene_FlankingRegion_TSSRegions
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the TSS regions that have been mapped in the flanking region of the specified gene or list of genes.

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the GO annotations.

template.name: Gene_Organism1_Orthologue_Organism2
template.title: Genes in organism one --> Orthologues in organism two

query.name: Gene_Organism1_Orthologue_Organism2
query.longDescription: Show the predicted orthologues between two organisms.

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes, show the proteins.

query.name: Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Show the publications for each protein. References are loaded from toxoMine and NCBI.

template.name: InterProDomain_ProteinGene
template.title: Protein Domain(s) --> Proteins + Genes coding for these proteins

query.name: InterProDomain_ProteinGene
query.view: Protein.proteinDomains.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomains.name Protein.proteinDomains.type Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a specified InterPro protein domain or list of domains, show the proteins and genes from a particular organism.

template.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
template.title: Protein(s) --> Gene + Chromosomal location and length of the gene

query.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.end Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Protein.genes.length
query.longDescription: For a specified protein or list of proteins, show the chromosomal location and the length of the gene(s) that codes for the specified protein(s).

query.name: Proteins_To_Domains
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.proteinDomains.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomains.name Protein.proteinDomains.shortName
query.longDescription: For a specified protein or list of proteins, show the protein domains.

query.name: Organism_Gene
query.longDescription: For a specified organism or list of organisms, show all genes.

constraint.description: Show all the genes from organism:

template.name: Organism_GeneDomain
template.title: Organism(s) --> All genes with a specific protein domain(s)

query.name: Organism_GeneDomain
query.longDescription: For a specified organism or list of organisms, show all genes that code for proteins with a specified protein domain(s).

constraint.description: Search for genes in the following organism:

query.name: Organism_Protein
query.longDescription: For a specified organism or list of organisms, show all proteins.

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For a specified chromosome or list of chromosomes, show all genes.

template.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
template.title: Chromosome(s) --> All intergenic regions + start, end and length of intergenic regions.

query.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
query.longDescription: For a specified chromosome or list of chromosomes, show the integenic regions with start, end, and length of the intergenic regions.

query.name: Chromosome_Location_BindingSites
query.longDescription: For a specified chromosome or list of chromosomes, show the binding sites within a specified location.

query.name: Project_features
query.longDescription: For a specified project or list of projects, show all sequence features.

query.name: Experiment_features
query.longDescription: For a specified experiment or list of experiments, show all sequence features.

constraint.value: Identifying genome-wide binding sites for GCN5b

query.name: Submission_features
query.longDescription: For a specified submission or list of submissions, show all sequence features.

query.name: Experiment_Category_Submissions
query.view: Experiment.name Experiment.category Experiment.submissions.TCid Experiment.submissions.name Experiment.submissions.technique Experiment.submissions.qualityControl
query.longDescription: For a specified experiment category or list of categories, show the experiments and submissions that have used the specified category(s).

query.name: Experiment_Category_ToxoplasmaMutant
query.view: Experiment.name Experiment.category Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.name Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.targetName Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.strain Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.background Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.mutantSelection Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.mutantType Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.targetGene.primaryIdentifier Experiment.toxoplasmaMutants.organism.name
query.longDescription: For a specified experiment category or list of categories, show the experiments and toxoplasma mutants used.

query.name: Submission_BindingSites
query.longDescription: For a specified submission or list of submissions, show the binding sites.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and A and E

constraint.description: Show binding sites identified on chromosome:

query.name: ProtocolType_Submissions
query.longDescription: For a specified protocol type or list of types, show all submissions that have used the specified protocol type(s).

query.name: Submission_Submission_BindingSite
query.longDescription: Show the binding sites that overlap between binding sites of two submissions

query.name: FeatureType_submissions
query.longDescription: For a specified feature type or list of types, show all submissions.

constraint.description: Show all submissions which produce features of type:
